data.name: PAYDAY 2: Jiu Feng Smuggler Pack 3
data.detailed_description:
With Golden Dagger Triad henchmen swarming like angry bees around the Payday Gang as of late, it’s as good a time as any to get that arsenal upped a bit.

And it just so happens that Jiu Feng has a new shipment coming in, containing guns, weapon mods, weapon colors as well as brand new weapon charms. Looking good and looking dangerous!

The Jiu Feng Smuggler Pack 3 includes an assault rifle, a revolver, a pistol, 10 weapon mods, 4 weapon colors and 4 weapon charms.

New weapons

  • KS12 Urban Assault Rifle
  • Kang Arms Model 54 Pistol
  • RUS12 Angry Tiger Revolver

New mods

  • KS12 DMR Kit
  • KS12-A Burst Muzzle
  • KS12-S Long Silencer
  • KA54 Extended Magazine
  • KA54 Bull Stopper Addon
  • KA54 Barrel Extender
  • RUS-K Tactical Short Barrel
  • RUS-J Long Valley Barrel and Stabilizer
  • RUS Custom Wood Grip
  • New weapon colors
  • Fight Cat
  • Hanzi Blue Scale
  • Green Circuit Maze
  • Pink Cloud, Flying Tiger

New weapon charms

  • Dangle Bang
  • Hangin’ Loot
  • Piggy Charm
  • Dangling Dallas

data.short_description: With Golden Dagger henchmen swarming like angry bees around the gang as of late, it’s as good a time as any to get that arsenal upped a bit. And Jiu Feng delivers as usual, offering an assault rifle, a revolver and a pistol, along with mods, colors and charms.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7
  • Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 10
  • Processor:2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
